title: SmartCubeCoin
author: SmartCubeCoin
created_time: September 05, 2022, 09:32:05 PMLast edit: September 07, 2022, 10:17:39 PM by SmartCubeCoin
content: SmartCubeA fast solution to decentralized and anonymous PaymentsLaunch DateSeptember 5, 2022  http://smartcubecoin.sitehttp://smartcubecoin.site/roadmap.htmlhttps://discord.gg/invite/Cry6Jmb5Ka----- About SmartCube -----SmartCube is a peer to peer decentralized cryptocurrency coin that aims on fast and anonymous payments.We are a community based cryptocurrency and listen to all inputs from our community!We plan to launch a mining platform, SmartCube creditcard payment processor, masternodes andmuch more in the upcoming months/years. Created by the people for the people.----- Specifications -----Symbol:Algorithm:                  Total Coin Supply:Block Time:Block Reward:Difficulty Retarget:PoW Mining:Premine:XSCChukwa/Argon2id30,000,000 XSC15 Seconds3 XSC (halving every year)Every BlockCPU/GPU (ASIC Resistant)600,000 XSC----- Masternode Plan -----SmartCube Masternodes provide a 2nd layer of security to the network by providing additional nodes to validate blocks,transactions and creditcard transactions. Masternode owners are rewarded for their service to the network, with a portionof the block reward being sent to a masternode. There reward will increase overtime the more they are trusted on thenetwork. Masternodes are also given voting rights to participate in project decisions.You will be able to pre order a masternode right now. Pre ordering a masternode will give you multiple benefits:- You will given a special 'Investor' role- You will be listed on the website as a contributor- You will be getting +5% reward bonus (If masternode reward is 4% - 5% it will be increased to 9% - 10%)- You will get beta/alpha access to all of our ongoing projects- Free SmartCube creditcard and payment processor on release- SmartCube Raspberry Pi 4 Mini Node (device)Masternodes will be usable in Q1 of 2023.* Please send me a message in discord for a purchase. Payable in BTC, USDT, ETH, LTC or any other valuable currency.SmartCube Masternode LightCode:Cost: 0.0075 BTC (On release: 20,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~4% - ~6% (~800 XSC - ~1,200 XSC)SmartCube Masternode MediumCode:Cost: 0.015 BTC (On release: 25,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~9% - ~13% (~2,250 XSC - ~3,250 XSC)SmartCube Masternode HeavyCode:Cost: 0.03 BTC (On release: 35,000 XSC)Rewards a month: ~20% - ~24% (~7,000 XSC - ~8,400 XSC)----- Links -----Websitehttp://smartcubecoin.siteRoadmaphttp://smartcubecoin.site/roadmap.htmlPoolhttp://pool.smartcubecoin.siteAsia Poolhttp://pool-asia.smartcubecoin.siteExplorerhttp://explorer.smartcubecoin.siteDiscordhttps://discord.gg/invite/Cry6Jmb5KaTwitterhttps://twitter.com/SmartCubeCoinGithubhttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/SmartCubePaper Wallet Generatorhttp://paper.smartcubecoin.site/----- Software Releases -----SmartCube Codebasehttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/SmartCube/releases/latestSmartCube GUI Wallethttps://github.com/SmartCubeCoin/smartcube-wallet-proton/releases/latest----- Tutorials -----Mining with NinjaRig (How to mine SmartCube)http://docs.smartcubecoin.site/#/mining_with_ninjarig

comments.author: prop329
comments.body: Interesting......Might have to mine this and see where it goes...

comments.author: SmartCubeCoin
comments.body: Quote from: prop329 on September 06, 2022, 12:59:14 AMInteresting......Might have to mine this and see where it goes...Thank you for the support! ❤️

comments.author: hacklik
comments.body: Quote from: prop329 on September 06, 2022, 12:59:14 AMInteresting......Might have to mine this and see where it goes...Do not install! Trojan!

comments.author: SmartCubeCoin
comments.body: Quote from: hacklik on September 06, 2022, 04:02:42 AMQuote from: prop329 on September 06, 2022, 12:59:14 AMInteresting......Might have to mine this and see where it goes...Do not install! Trojan!There is a built in miner inside the zip file. It will be detected as a virus. This is a false report. The code is open source. Look in the source code and compile it from scratch if you do not trust the pre compiled binaries.

comments.author: Butterflyman
comments.body: Snowflake, Indium, Cryptic... Been there done that. All tragic failed projects with same algo. Contaminated with viruses and trojans. Probably same devs.Nice try.Forget it.

comments.author: ahousefavor
comments.body: Quote from: Butterflyman on September 06, 2022, 08:31:06 AMSnowflake, Indium, Cryptic... Been there done that. All tragic failed projects with same algo. Contaminated with viruses and trojans. Probably same devs.Nice try.Forget it.There webpage is hosted on snowflake-net.... I wonder

comments.author: Nooneyouknow
comments.body: Yep. Wallet  version 1.01 comes with free trojan.

comments.author: StianNOR
comments.body: Dude, how many false positive trojans you get in the mining game? How about Lolminer, t-rex miner, srbminer and so on. all scams? they show viruses. many wallets aswell. Relax the SCAM screams are hanging very loosely.To be fair the dev does a very good job. Looks like a very promising project. Kepp up the good work and dont lisen to all the FUD.

comments.author: MMOStars
comments.body: Quote from: Butterflyman on September 06, 2022, 08:31:06 AMSnowflake, Indium, Cryptic... Been there done that. All tragic failed projects with same algo. Contaminated with viruses and trojans. Probably same devs.Nice try.Forget it.It's funny how a couple of scams and literally you come to see the same algo and you know it's a guaranteed dump, because nobody else would use that algo anymore.

HE ARE LUCK THAT HE DOSENT LIVE NEXT DOOR. FUCKING WANKER.Its funny that your defending the exact same person you were cussing out for ripping you off a year ago

comments.body: Yes dead It’s a scam coinThe dev has sold some smartnode which are worthless to some crypto newbie and has closed everything including discord, websites and pools.Watch out, a new scam similar to this will pop out in sometime.
